ELEMENT.TITLE: Product: print product info (no add to cart or options)
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: This layout will display 6 images down the left column and most product data in the right. No add to cart button is present. This layout is for informational purposes only (popups, ajax and such). DO NOT select this layout. This layout subject to change without warning.

ELEMENT.HTML:
<%
/* legacy support is to link to the product detail page. however, if this is loaded in popup.cgi, product is passed on URI and needs to be put into focus */

print("");
loadurp("VAR::product"); default("");
stop(unless=>$_);
	set($FOCUSSKU=>$_);
	element(TYPE=>"SET",SRC=>"SREF::PID",DATA=>$FOCUSSKU);
	element(TYPE=>"SET",SRC=>"SREF::SKU",DATA=>$FOCUSSKU);
	print("
	
	<!-- focus sku changed to: ");
	print($FOCUSSKU);
	print(" -->
	
	");
%>

<% print(""); set($i=>"1"); /* this is the product field that we append $i to for generating the image key. */ set($image_key=>"product:zoovy:prod_image"); :LOOP(); print(" "); load($image_key); format(posttext=>$i); loadurp($_); /* we use the filename in multiple places, so I set the var instead of loadurp'ing it several times. */ set($image=>$_); /* if the current load has no value, then there are no more images to process. Stop. Otherwise, print a thumbnail with JS to change big image and open original onclick */ stop(unless=>$_); print("
"); load($image); default("blank"); image(w=>"150",h=>"350",m=>"1",tag=>"1",bg=>"ffffff"); print(); print("
"); load($i); math(op=>"add",var=>"1"); set($i=>$_); /* Go to loop and do it all again. */ goto(label=>"LOOP",ne=>""); %>

Customer Reviews
<% print($CUSTOMER_NAME); %> of <% load($LOCATION); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($SUBJECT); default(""); print(); %>		 <% /* load the profile review icon that is selected. If not set, use default instead. */ loadurp("CSS::zcolor.bgcolor"); set($bgcolor=>$_); loadurp("profile:zoovy:prod_reviews_icon"); default("colored_stars"); format(pretext=>"stock/reviews/",posttext=>"/"); set($image_loc=>$_); load($RATING); format(pretext=>$image_loc); image(src=>$_,library=>"proshop",h=>"25",w=>"110",bg=>$bgcolor,tag=>"1"); print(); %>
